snippet: The government presented three rebuttal witnesses after the defense rested its case. Closing arguments will be heard Tuesday, and the case could go to the jury Tuesday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: The government presented three rebuttal witnesses after the defense rested its case. Closing arguments will be heard Tuesday, and the case could go to the jury Tuesday afternoon.

headline.seo: Testimony Concludes Without Clemens Taking Stand
headline.main: Testimony Concludes Without Clemens Taking Stand
